Roi des Roses.description: Roi des Roses is a game that I created in 2024 with a team of 3 student. It is a card game based on the famous game 'King of Tokyo'. The goal is to be the first player to reach 20 points. The game is played with 2 and takes about 30 minutes to play. You can play against a player or against a bot.

B.I.E.N..description: SAE-SiteInfo-BIEN is an educational and interactive website designed to raise public awareness of the environmental impact of digital technology, and in particular of technology-related CO2 production. The main objective is to help users become aware of the technology sector's carbon footprint through visual and customizable data.

Moonify.description: Moonify is a command-line Spotify client that lets you listen to music on your terminal. It's designed to be light and fast, while offering a pleasant user experience. A GUI versio has also been implemented for people who aren't comfortable with CLIs, enabling a better experience and handling.
